page.title: 05Yearly Events (cont.)
page.content: The best dog in the whole show.There is also a horse show. {School Events. }There are other annual events like the {Church}sales and the{Play School Group}jumble sales.The school holds a bring and buy sale with drinks and cakes.The school also holds a{Havest Festival}and{ {Christmas Service} in the church. {Our School Fete.} At our school each year we have a {school sports day}and{summer fete}.We sell toys and books, ice creams we have our school races and we have pony rides and a bring and buy saleand our school hall is used as a cafe .Sometimes people come and help set things out .Our{school races }are held on the {field. }We have mums and dads race and an under fives we also have a raffle. Wehave{sideshows }we have a bowling alley.
